verses.verse: וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> ye-Hi came כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> sha-Ma' heard סַנְבַלַּ֗ט <WH5571> san-val-Lat, But it came to pass that when Sanballat כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <WH587> 'a-Nach-nu we בוֹנִים֙ <WH1129> vo-Nim that we builded אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> ha-cho-Mah, the wall וַיִּ֣חַר <WH2734> vai-Yi-char he was wroth ל֔וֹ lo, וַיִּכְעַ֖ס <WH3707> vai-yich-'As indignation הַרְבֵּ֑ה <WH7235> har-Beh; and took great וַיַּלְעֵ֖ג <WH3932> vai-yal-'Eg and mocked עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and הַיְּהוּדִֽים׃ <WH3064> hai-ye-hu-Dim. the Jews

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר׀ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he spake לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֶחָ֗יו <WH251> 'e-Chav, his brethren וְחֵיל֙ <WH2426> ve-Cheil army שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> sho-me-Ron, of Samaria וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said מָ֛ה <WH4100> mah What הַיְּהוּדִ֥ים <WH3064> hai-ye-hu-Dim Jews הָאֲמֵלָלִ֖ים <WH537> ha-'a-me-la-Lim these feeble עֹשִׂ֑ים <WH6213> 'o-Sim; What do הֲיַעַזְב֨וּ <WH5800> ha-ya-'az-Vu commit self לָהֶ֤ם <WH1992> la-Hem they הֲיִזְבָּ֙חוּ֙ <WH2076> ha-yiz-Ba-chu themselves;will they sacrifice הַיְכַלּ֣וּ <WH3615> hay-chal-Lu ;will they make an end בַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> vai-Yom, age הַיְחַיּ֧וּ <WH2421> hay-chai-Yu keep leave אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֲבָנִ֛ים <WH68> ha-'a-va-Nim the stones מֵעֲרֵמ֥וֹת <WH6194> me-'a-re-Mot out of the heaps הֶעָפָ֖ר <WH6083> he-'a-Far of the rubbish וְהֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> ve-Hem-mah even שְׂרוּפֽוֹת׃ <WH8313> se-ru-Fot. which are burned

וְטוֹבִיָּ֥ה <WH2900> ve-toi-Yah Now Tobiah הָעַמֹּנִ֖י <WH5984> ha-'am-mo-Ni the Ammonite אֶצְל֑וֹ <WH681> etz-Lo; [was] by him וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, and he said גַּ֚ם <WH1571> gam Even אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- what הֵ֣ם <WH1992> hem they בּוֹנִ֔ים <WH1129> bo-Nim, Even that which they build אִם־ <WH518> 'im- should יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> ya-'a-Leh go up שׁוּעָ֔ל <WH7776> shu-'Al, if a fox וּפָרַ֖ץ <WH6555> u-fa-Ratz he shall even break down חוֹמַ֥ת <WH2346> cho-Mat wall אַבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH68> 'av-nei-Hem. their stone פ Peh

שְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> she-Ma' Hear אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu O our God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- how הָיִ֣ינוּ <WH1961> ha-Yi-nu become בוּזָ֔ה <WH939> vu-Zah, for we are despised וְהָשֵׁ֥ב <WH7725> ve-ha-Shev and turn חֶרְפָּתָ֖ם <WH2781> cher-pa-Tam their reproach אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- on רֹאשָׁ֑ם <WH7218> ro-Sham; upon their own head וּתְנֵ֥ם <WH5414> u-te-Nem and give לְבִזָּ֖ה <WH961> le-viz-Zah them for a prey בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land שִׁבְיָֽה׃ <WH7633> shiv-Yah. of captivity

וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תְּכַס֙ <WH3680> te-Chas And cover עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and עֲוֹנָ֔ם <WH5771> 'a-vo-Nam, not their iniquity וְחַטָּאתָ֖ם <WH2403> ve-chat-ta-Tam and let not their sin מִלְּפָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> mil-le-fa-Nei-cha from before אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay תִּמָּחֶ֑ה <WH4229> tim-ma-Cheh; be blotted out כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for הִכְעִ֖יסוּ <WH3707> hich-'I-su thee for they have provoked [thee] to anger לְנֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> le-Ne-ged about הַבּוֹנִֽים׃ <WH1129> hab-bo-Nim. before the builders

וַנִּבְנֶה֙ <WH1129> van-niv-Neh So built אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> ha-cho-Mah, we the wall וַתִּקָּשֵׁ֥ר <WH7194> vat-tik-ka-Sher was joined together כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and the whole הַחוֹמָ֖ה <WH2346> ha-cho-Mah and all the wall עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against חֶצְיָ֑הּ <WH2677> chetz-Yah; unto the half וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> vay-Hi had לֵ֦ב <WH3820> lev had a mind לָעָ֖ם <WH5971> la-'Am thereof for the people לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> la-'a-Sot. to work פ Peh

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> vay-Hi become כַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> cha-'a-Sher after שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> sha-Ma' heard סַנְבַלַּ֡ט <WH5571> san-val-Lat But it came to pass [that] when Sanballat וְ֠טוֹבִיָּה <WH2900> Ve-toi-yah and Tobiah וְהָעַרְבִ֨ים <WH6163> ve-ha-'ar-Vim and the Arabians וְהָעַמֹּנִ֜ים <WH5984> ve-ha-'am-mo-Nim and the Ammonites וְהָאַשְׁדּוֹדִ֗ים <WH796> ve-ha-'ash-do-Dim, and the Ashdodites כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for עָלְתָ֤ה <WH5927> 'al-Tah went אֲרוּכָה֙ <WH724> 'a-ru-Chah the repair לְחֹמ֣וֹת <WH2346> le-cho-Mot that the walls יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for הֵחֵ֥לּוּ <WH2490> he-Chel-lu began הַפְּרֻצִ֖ים <WH6555> hap-pe-ru-Tzim [and] that the breaches לְהִסָּתֵ֑ם <WH5640> le-his-sa-Tem; to be stopped וַיִּ֥חַר <WH2734> vai-Yi-char wroth לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. then they were very

וַיִּקְשְׁר֤וּ <WH7194> vai-yik-she-Ru And conspired כֻלָּם֙ <WH3605> chul-Lam All יַחְדָּ֔ו <WH3162> yach-Dav, all of them together לָב֖וֹא <WH935> la-Vo to come לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <WH3898> le-hil-la-Chem [and] to fight בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim; against Jerusalem וְלַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> ve-la-'a-Sot cause ל֖וֹ lo תּוֹעָֽה׃ <WH8442> to-'Ah. A disturbance

וַנִּתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <WH6419> van-nit-pal-Lel Nevertheless we made our prayer אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; unto our God וַנַּעֲמִ֨יד <WH5975> van-na-'a-Mid and set מִשְׁמָ֧ר <WH4929> mish-Mar a watch עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem and because יוֹמָ֥ם <WH3119> yo-Mam against them day וָלַ֖יְלָה <WH3915> va-Lay-lah and night מִפְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> mip-pe-nei-Hem. because

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, And Judah כָּשַׁל֙ <WH3782> ka-Shal is decayed כֹּ֣חַ <WH3581> Ko-ach The strength הַסַּבָּ֔ל <WH5449> has-sab-Bal, of the bearers of burdens וְהֶעָפָ֖ר <WH6083> ve-he-'a-Far rubbish הַרְבֵּ֑ה <WH7235> har-Beh; and [there is] much וַאֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <WH587> va-'a-Nach-nu ourselves לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo are not נוּכַ֔ל <WH3201> nu-Chal, so that we are not able לִבְנ֖וֹת <WH1129> liv-Not to build בַּחוֹמָֽה׃ <WH2346> ba-cho-Mah. the wall

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru said צָרֵ֗ינוּ <WH6862> tza-Rei-nu, And our adversaries לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo They will not יֵדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> ye-de-'U They shall not know וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo or יִרְא֔וּ <WH7200> yir-'U, neither see עַ֛ד <WH5704> 'ad against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after נָב֥וֹא <WH935> na-Vo till we come אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- in תּוֹכָ֖ם <WH8432> to-Cham in the midst וַהֲרַגְנ֑וּם <WH2026> va-ha-rag-Num; them and slay וְהִשְׁבַּ֖תְנוּ <WH7673> ve-hish-Bat-nu to cease אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> ham-me-la-Chah. them and cause the work

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi become כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ka-'a-Sher- where בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> Ba-'u came הַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <WH3064> hai-ye-hu-Dim, And it came to pass that when the Jews הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> hai-yo-she-Vim which dwelt אֶצְלָ֑ם <WH681> 'etz-Lam; by them וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-ru they said לָ֙נוּ֙ la-nu עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> 'E-ser unto us ten פְּעָמִ֔ים <WH6471> pe-'a-Mim, times מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol every הַמְּקֹמ֖וֹת <WH4725> ham-me-ko-Mot From all places אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- where תָּשׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> ta-Shu-vu whence ye shall return עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu. against

וָֽאַעֲמִ֞יד <WH5975> va-'a-'a-Mid Therefore set מִֽתַּחְתִּיּ֧וֹת <WH8482> mit-tach-ti-Yot I in the lower לַמָּק֛וֹם <WH4725> lam-ma-Kom places מֵאַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> me-'a-cha-Rei behind לַחוֹמָ֖ה <WH2346> la-cho-Mah the wall; בַּצְּחִחִיִּים batz-tze-chi-chi-yim כבַּצְּחִיחִ֑ים <WH6708> batz-tze-chi-Chim; higher place קוָֽאַעֲמִ֤יד <WH5975> va-'a-'a-Mid I even set אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am the people לְמִשְׁפָּח֔וֹת <WH4940> le-mish-pa-Chot, after their families עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with חַרְבֹתֵיהֶ֛ם <WH2719> char-vo-tei-Hem with their swords רָמְחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH7420> ra-me-chei-Hem their spears וְקַשְּׁתֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH7198> ve-kash-she-to-tei-Hem. and their bows

וָאֵ֣רֶא <WH7200> va-'E-re And I looked וָאָק֗וּם <WH6965> va-'a-Kum, and rose up וָאֹמַ֞ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar and said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַחֹרִ֤ים <WH2715> ha-cho-Rim unto the nobles וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- about הַסְּגָנִים֙ <WH5461> has-se-ga-Nim and to the rulers וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to יֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> Ye-ter and to the rest הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, of the people אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּֽירְא֖וּ <WH3372> ti-re-'U Be not ye afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> mip-pe-nei-Hem; of them אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲדֹנָ֞י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord הַגָּד֤וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol [which is] great וְהַנּוֹרָא֙ <WH3372> ve-han-no-Ra and terrible זְכֹ֔רוּ <WH2142> ze-Cho-ru, remember וְהִֽלָּחֲמ֗וּ <WH3898> ve-hil-la-cha-Mu, and fight עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- for אֲחֵיכֶם֙ <WH251> 'a-chei-Chem for your brethren בְּנֵיכֶ֣ם <WH1121> be-nei-Chem your sons וּבְנֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1323> u-ve-no-tei-Chem, and your daughters נְשֵׁיכֶ֖ם <WH802> ne-shei-Chem your wives וּבָתֵּיכֶֽם׃ <WH1004> u-vat-tei-Chem. and your houses פ Peh

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> vay-Hi become כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ka-'a-Sher- after שָׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> sha-me-'U heard אוֹיְבֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH341> 'oy-Vei-nu And it came to pass when our enemies כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- that it was נ֣וֹדַֽע <WH3045> No-da' that it was known לָ֔נוּ La-nu, וַיָּ֥פֶר <WH6565> vai-Ya-fer to nought הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him unto us and God אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲצָתָ֑ם <WH6098> 'a-tza-Tam; their counsel; וַנָּשׁוּב van-na-shuv כוַנָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> van-Na-shov break קכֻּלָּ֙נוּ֙ <WH3605> kul-La-nu all אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> ha-cho-Mah, all of us to the wall אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to his מְלַאכְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4399> me-lach-To. unto his work

וַיְהִ֣י׀ <WH1961> vay-Hi become מִן־ <WH4480> min- that הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom And it came to pass from that time הַה֗וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu, he חֲצִ֣י <WH2677> cha-Tzi forth [that] the half נְעָרַי֮ <WH5288> ne-'a-Rai of my servants עֹשִׂ֣ים <WH6213> 'o-Sim wrought בַּמְּלָאכָה֒ <WH4399> bam-me-la-Chah in the work וְחֶצְיָ֗ם <WH2677> ve-chetz-Yam, and the other half מַחֲזִיקִים֙ <WH2388> ma-cha-zi-Kim of them held וְהָרְמָחִ֣ים <WH7420> ve-ha-re-ma-Chim both the spears הַמָּגִנִּ֔ים <WH4043> ham-ma-gin-Nim, the shields וְהַקְּשָׁת֖וֹת <WH7198> ve-hak-ke-sha-Tot and the bows וְהַשִּׁרְיֹנִ֑ים <WH8302> ve-hash-shir-yo-Nim; and the habergeons וְהַ֨שָּׂרִ֔ים <WH8269> ve-Has-sa-Rim, and the rulers אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei [were] behind כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- the whole בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit all the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

הַבּוֹנִ֧ים <WH1129> hab-bo-Nim They which builded בַּחוֹמָ֛ה <WH2346> ba-cho-Mah on the wall וְהַנֹּשְׂאִ֥ים <WH5375> ve-han-no-se-'Im and they that bare בַּסֶּ֖בֶל <WH5447> bas-Se-vel burdens עֹמְשִׂ֑ים <WH6006> 'o-me-Sim; with those that laded בְּאַחַ֤ת <WH259> be-'a-Chat [every one] with one יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> ya-Do of his hands עֹשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh wrought בַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> vam-me-la-Chah, in the work וְאַחַ֖ת <WH259> ve-'a-Chat and with the other מַחֲזֶ֥קֶת <WH2388> ma-cha-Ze-ket [hand] held הַשָּֽׁלַח׃ <WH7973> hash-Sha-lach. a weapon

וְהַ֨בּוֹנִ֔ים <WH1129> ve-Hab-bo-Nim, For the builders אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every one חַרְבּ֛וֹ <WH2719> char-Bo had his sword אֲסוּרִ֥ים <WH631> 'a-su-Rim girded עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- at מָתְנָ֖יו <WH4975> ma-te-Nav by his side וּבוֹנִ֑ים <WH1129> u-vo-Nim; and [so] builded וְהַתּוֹקֵ֥עַ <WH8628> ve-hat-to-Ke-a' And he that sounded בַּשּׁוֹפָ֖ר <WH7782> bash-sho-Far the trumpet אֶצְלִֽי׃ <WH681> 'etz-Li. [was] by me
